extendedInfo.description: Intelligent scene is a powerful, easy to use software to switch the scene, you can set WIFI, flight mode, Bluetooth, backlight brightness, backlight time, volume, wallpaper and other information, options are very rich, you can customize the outdoors, meeting, sleeping, etc. different models. Divided into the following two functions: A Scenario Set   Default provides four scenarios: standard, vibration, silent, meeting. Users can also according to actual demand, new scenarios or modify profiles. Profiles include: tone, volume, vibration, wallpaper, backlight brightness, backlight time. II. Rest set   In addition to setting the user scenario, the intelligent scene can also be rest set to automatically change the profile based on time to achieve the purpose. System provides a default work, travel, travel three kinds of work and rest, rest the same user can create or modify schedules set. Rest set contains schedule, scene selection, application selection, open the Bluetooth off, turn off WiFi, turn off flight mode.

reviews.title: If only I could read Chinese
reviews.comment: It might be great, but I can\'t get past the first screen due to a lack of English support
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Silly people
reviews.comment: The screenshots show this is asian.  Why on earth would you dock stars for that?? If you can\'t understand the language just realize it is your \"fault\", not theirs... and uninstall, move on. There are thousands of languages in the world, not just yours. It is completely silly to give low stars for your own ignorance. I installed just to comment, and 5 stars to help offset 1 and 2 stars.  Think people. Dang.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great idea, bad implementation
reviews.comment: it is a great idea, only if it let you preform the action you want. this app only allow limited actions, and lack of flexibility to combine them in a way I want. e.g. why do I have to set alarm volume on every task? give the option to \"leave it as is\"!
reviews.author: Tony Zhang

reviews.comment: Entire app in an asian language, cant understand any of it, sounds awesome though...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: May be a great app but I don\'t speak Chinese.
reviews.author: A Google User
